text: “Allah walonjeza mwa inu amene akhulupirira ndikuchita ntchito yabwino kuti ndithu awathandiza kukhala oyang’anira pa dziko monga momwe adawachitira amene adalipo kale kukhala oyang’anira; ndipo ndithu awalimbikitsira chipembedzo chawo chimene wawayanja nacho; ndipo awachotsera mantha awo kukhala opanda mantha.” Akhale akundilambira Ine, osandiphatikiza ndi chilichonse. Ndipo amene asiye kukhulupirira pambuyo pa zimenezi, iwo ngakuswa malamulo
